creator: j_a_fernandez@yahoo.com
text:
<zipfileset> allows you to modify the names of the files being added in
the <zip> task and relatives, but it does not allow a way to specify a mapper.
so that one can just use regular expressions, glob substitutions or specify 
flatten, etc.

I think the patch in that other report covers this, not entirely sure.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 19523 ***
creator: bodewig@apache.org
